summary: Completed testing of 'Groupes de Disciples' (Bergeries) feature. All backend APIs and frontend UI working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Test data created via API: TEST_Jean Dupont (member), TEST_Pierre Test (member), TEST_Sophie Contact (contact), objectives for Février 2026 and Mars 2026
context_for_next_testing_agent: Bergeries Disciples feature fully tested. 41 groups available via /api/bergeries-disciples/list. Detail page at /bergerie-disciple/{id} has 3 tabs: Membres, Suivi Disciples, Reproduction. All CRUD operations working.

pages_tested: /bergeries - Choice page with 2 cards (Promotions and Groupes de Disciples)
/bergeries-disciples - List of 41 groups with city filter
features_verified: Click on 'Groupes de Disciples' navigates to /bergeries-disciples
Click on group navigates to detail page
Detail page shows bergerie name, responsable, ville
3 tabs visible: Membres, Suivi Disciples, Reproduction
Suivi Disciples tab shows stats (Oui, En Cours, Non) and status dropdowns
Reproduction tab shows Objectifs de Multiplication and Personnes Contactées
